text: GUATEMALA CITY, 19 AUG 89 -- GUATEMALAN ARMY TROOPS KILLED NINE PEASANTS BY MISTAKE ON 17 AUGUST. THE SOLDIERS MISTOOK THE PEASANTS, WHO WERE CIVIL SELF-DEFENSE PATROL (PAC) MEMBERS, WITH A REBEL COLUMN. THE INCIDENT TOOK PLACE WHEN NORTHEASTERN COBAN BASE TROOPS ATTACKED THE CIVILIAN PATROL. THE ATTACK RESULTED IN 9 INDIAN PEASANTS KILLED AND 3 WOUNDED, INCLUDING A 17-YEAR-OLD.

CARACAS, 27 OCT 89 -- FIVE VENEZUELAN SOLDIERS WERE KILLED AT THE BORDER WITH COLOMBIA. COLOMBIAN GUERRILLAS PERPETRATED AN ATTACK WITH VERY POWERFUL EXPLOSIVES AGAINST A NATIONAL GUARD JEEP. THE EXPLOSIVES THAT KILLED THE FIVE SOLDIERS WERE BURIED IN A ROAD AND SET OFF BY REMOTE CONTROL AS THE MILITARY VEHICLE PASSED BY.

BOGOTA, 16 SEP 89 -- TWO NATIONAL POLICE OFFICERS WERE SHOT TO DEATH AS THEY PASSED BY ON A MOTORCYCLE. THE CRIMINALS INTERCEPTED SERGEANT CARLOS JULIO BONILLA AND CORPORAL LUIS ALBERTO CHAVEZ. THE PAID ASSASSINS FLED IN A MOTORCYCLE. ELSEWHERE, SEVERAL ARMED INDIVIDUALS SHOT REPEATEDLY AT THE NEWSPAPER EL SIGLO'S FACILITIES.

SAN SALVADOR, 19 APR 89 -- ATTORNEY GENERAL ROBERTO GARCIA ALVARADO WAS KILLED WHEN A BOMB PLACED BY URBAN GUERRILLAS ON HIS VEHICLE EXPLODED. AN INDIVIDUAL PLACED A BOMB ON THE ROOF OF THE ARMORED VEHICLE. GUERRILLAS ATTACKED MERINO'S HOME WITH EXPLOSIVES.

LIMA, 5 OCT 89 -- HECTOR DELGADO PARKER WAS KIDNAPPED IN DOWNTOWN LIMA BY A COMMANDO OF THE TUPAC AMARU REVOLUTIONARY MOVEMENT (MRTA). AS A RESULT OF THE TERRORIST ACTION, DELGADO'S DRIVER WAS KILLED, AND DELGADO'S BODYGUARD WAS SERIOUSLY WOUNDED.

MANAGUA, 15 JUN 89 -- CONTRAS FIRED MORTARS AT A FARMING COOPERATIVE NEAR ESTELI. THE REBELS LAUNCHED AN ATTACK USING AUTOMATIC WEAPONS AGAINST THE COMMUNITY CENTER. THREE COOPERATIVE MEMBERS WERE WOUNDED IN THE ASSAULT.
